player_information.key_achievements: Pro Bowl selections 4 times in his career , AP All-Pro 2nd Team selections , broke Michael Irvin's Cowboys franchise record for receptions and receiving yards in a single season , led all receivers in yards, touchdowns and fantasy points in 2023
player_information.performance_goals: maintaining elite wide receiver status and helping lead the Cowboys to a Super Bowl championship

team_information.team_strategy: building an elite offensive core around established stars like CeeDee Lamb
